programme.desc: When Barbra Jean begins childbirth, Reba searches the wilderness for the camping father-to-be, Brock.

programme.desc: When Brock spends a night in Jake's treehouse, Reba finds herself babysitting her ex-husband's newborn.

programme.desc: Cheyenne goes into labor shortly before her high-school graduation ceremony; Reba sings a lullaby to her new granddaughter in the hospital.

programme.desc: A writer returns to her family ranch where she discovers what ended her marriage and why she stopped riding horses.

programme.desc: Sparks fly between a ballet instructor and a professional hockey player as she tries to help him recover from the same injury that sidelined her dancing career.

programme.desc: After losing her fortune, an heiress moves to a rural farm where she mistakes her handsome neighbor for the handyman. To live up to her family's legacy, he helps her compete.
